widgets.title: Total Transactions[5m] by Currency vs avg. CPU load on k8s node

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs
| filter pay_transaction.amount > '0.0' 
| groupby $m.timestamp / 5m as time, pay_transaction.currency as currency aggregate count() as trans_count

widgets.title: Total Transactions[5m] by Currency vs avg. memory usage on k8s node

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs
| filter pay_transaction.amount > '0.0' 
| groupby $m.timestamp / 5m as time, pay_transaction.currency as currency aggregate count() as trans_count

source logs
| convert $d.json.http_resp_status:number
| filter $d.json.http_resp_status >= 500
| groupby $d.json.http_req_path as request_path, json.http_req_ip_geoip.country_name as country_name, $d.json.http_req_ip_geoip.city_name as city_name, $d.json.http_req_method as request_method aggregate count() as occurrence
| filter $d.city_name != null
| orderby occurrence desc

widgets.title: Avg HTTP Response vs. Error Logs & Spans

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter name == 'paymentservice-charge'
| count into total_transaction_count

widgets.title: Average Transaction by Curreny & Card Type per Hour

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs
| filter pay_transaction.amount != null && pay_transaction.currency != null
| filter $p.currency == null || $d.pay_transaction.currency.inArray($p.currency)
| multigroupby ($m.timestamp / 1h as timestamp, pay_transaction.currency as currency, pay_transaction.cc as card_type)
    aggregate round(avg(pay_transaction.amount:num),2) as amount
| sortby timestamp

source logs
| filter pay_transaction.amount > '0.0'
| filter $p.currency == null || $d.pay_transaction.currency.inArray($p.currency)
| groupby pay_transaction.currency as currency aggregate round(sum(pay_transaction.amount:num),2) as totalAmount
| orderby totalAmount desc

source logs
| filter pay_transaction.amount > '0.0'
| filter pay_transaction.currency == 'USD'
| groupby pay_transaction.currency as currency aggregate round(sum(pay_transaction.amount:num),2) as totalAmount

source logs
| filter pay_transaction.amount > '0.0'
| filter pay_transaction.currency == 'EUR'
| groupby pay_transaction.currency as currency aggregate round(sum(pay_transaction.amount:num),2) as totalAmount

source logs
| filter pay_transaction.amount > '0.0'
| filter pay_transaction.currency == 'JPY'
| groupby pay_transaction.currency as currency aggregate round(sum(pay_transaction.amount:num),2) as totalAmount

source logs
| filter pay_transaction.amount > '0.0'
| filter pay_transaction.currency == 'CAD'
| groupby pay_transaction.currency as currency aggregate round(sum(pay_transaction.amount:num),2) as totalAmount
